body:
The same failure (with a slightly different stack at the bottom) occurs when building libgo if -fgo-optimize-allocs is used on x86 as well as ppc64le.

Checkout gcc trunk, build libgo adding the -fgo-optimize-allocs option.
Or, if gccgo from gcc trunk is already built, the compile command fails on x86 f20 distro like this:

cd src/libgo/go/compress/lzw
gccgo -c -o x.o reader.go writer.go -fgo-optimize-allocs
go1: internal compiler error: in operator(), at go/gofrontend/dataflow.cc:225
0x5d4d7f Dataflow::Compare_vars::operator()(Named_object const*, Named_object const*) const
	/home/boger/gccgo.work/trunk/bld/../src/gcc/go/gofrontend/dataflow.cc:225
0x5d52c2 std::_Rb_tree<Named_object*, std::pair<Named_object* const, std::vector<Dataflow::Ref, std::allocator<Dataflow::Ref> >*>, std::_Select1st<std::pair<Named_object* const, std::vector<Dataflow::Ref, std::allocator<Dataflow::Ref> >*> >, Dataflow::Compare_vars, std::allocator<std::pair<Named_object* const, std::vector<Dataflow::Ref, std::allocator<Dataflow::Ref> >*> > >::_M_get_insert_unique_pos(Named_object* const&)
	/usr/include/c++/4.8.3/bits/stl_tree.h:1324
0x5d52c2 std::_Rb_tree<Named_object*, std::pair<Named_object* const, std::vector<Dataflow::Ref, std::allocator<Dataflow::Ref> >*>, std::_Select1st<std::pair<Named_object* const, std::vector<Dataflow::Ref, std::allocator<Dataflow::Ref> >*> >, Dataflow::Compare_vars, std::allocator<std::pair<Named_object* const, std::vector<Dataflow::Ref, std::allocator<Dataflow::Ref> >*> > >::_M_insert_unique(std::pair<Named_object* const, std::vector<Dataflow::Ref, std::allocator<Dataflow::Ref> >*> const&)
	/usr/include/c++/4.8.3/bits/stl_tree.h:1377
0x5d52c2 std::map<Named_object*, std::vector<Dataflow::Ref, std::allocator<Dataflow::Ref> >*, Dataflow::Compare_vars, std::allocator<std::pair<Named_object* const, std::vector<Dataflow::Ref, std::allocator<Dataflow::Ref> >*> > >::insert(std::pair<Named_object* const, std::vector<Dataflow::Ref, std::allocator<Dataflow::Ref> >*> const&)
	/usr/include/c++/4.8.3/bits/stl_map.h:595
0x5d52c2 Dataflow::add_ref(Named_object*, Statement*)
	/home/boger/gccgo.work/trunk/bld/../src/gcc/go/gofrontend/dataflow.cc:269
0x5d5420 Dataflow_traverse_expressions::expression(Expression**)
	/home/boger/gccgo.work/trunk/bld/../src/gcc/go/gofrontend/dataflow.cc:65
0x5e56bd Expression::traverse(Expression**, Traverse*)
	/home/boger/gccgo.work/trunk/bld/../src/gcc/go/gofrontend/expressions.cc:43
0x5f0708 Expression_list::traverse(Traverse*)
	/home/boger/gccgo.work/trunk/bld/../src/gcc/go/gofrontend/expressions.cc:14913
0x5f0759 Call_expression::do_traverse(Traverse*)
	/home/boger/gccgo.work/trunk/bld/../src/gcc/go/gofrontend/expressions.cc:8610
0x5d549e Dataflow_traverse_assignment::value(Expression**, bool, bool)
	/home/boger/gccgo.work/trunk/bld/../src/gcc/go/gofrontend/dataflow.cc:142
0x650717 Assignment_statement::do_traverse_assignments(Traverse_assignments*)
	/home/boger/gccgo.work/trunk/bld/../src/gcc/go/gofrontend/statements.cc:563
0x5d4c06 Dataflow_traverse_statements::statement(Block*, unsigned long*, Statement*)
	/home/boger/gccgo.work/trunk/bld/../src/gcc/go/gofrontend/dataflow.cc:175
0x652fe4 Statement::traverse(Block*, unsigned long*, Traverse*)
	/home/boger/gccgo.work/trunk/bld/../src/gcc/go/gofrontend/statements.cc:44
0x61738d Block::traverse(Traverse*)
	/home/boger/gccgo.work/trunk/bld/../src/gcc/go/gofrontend/gogo.cc:5821
0x61738d Block::traverse(Traverse*)
	/home/boger/gccgo.work/trunk/bld/../src/gcc/go/gofrontend/gogo.cc:5821
0x61738d Block::traverse(Traverse*)
	/home/boger/gccgo.work/trunk/bld/../src/gcc/go/gofrontend/gogo.cc:5821
0x6175ce Function::traverse(Traverse*)
	/home/boger/gccgo.work/trunk/bld/../src/gcc/go/gofrontend/gogo.cc:4923
0x619e9e Bindings::traverse(Traverse*, bool)
	/home/boger/gccgo.work/trunk/bld/../src/gcc/go/gofrontend/gogo.cc:7604
0x61a171 Gogo::traverse(Traverse*)
	/home/boger/gccgo.work/trunk/bld/../src/gcc/go/gofrontend/gogo.cc:2519
0x5d4e58 Dataflow::initialize(Gogo*)
	/home/boger/gccgo.work/trunk/bld/../src/gcc/go/gofrontend/dataflow.cc:241
Please submit a full bug report,
with preprocessed source if appropriate.
Please include the complete backtrace with any bug report.
See <http://gcc.gnu.org/bugs.html> for instructions.
